result.eng: I would like to go somewhere remote.
result.ga: Ba maith liom dul áit éigin iargúlta
result.orig: Ba maith liom dul áit éigin iargúlta
result.html: Ba maith liom dul áit éigin iargúltaI would like to go somewhere remote.
result.ponchtml: Ba maiṫ liom dul áit éigin iargúltaI would like to go somewhere remote.

result.eng: I would like to say something on this matter.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seoI would like to say something on this matter.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ar an áḃar seoI would like to say something on this matter.

result.eng: I would like to say something about that.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sinI would like to say something about that.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ina ṫaoḃ sinI would like to say something about that.

result.eng: I knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ga: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.orig: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.html: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḟios agam go raiḃ idirḋealú éigin ann idir an dá rud aċ ní raiḃ mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.

result.eng: I feel that something is not right.
result.ga: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI feel that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Braiṫim go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI feel that something is not right.

result.eng: I need to discuss something with you.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.orig: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.html: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leatI need to discuss something with you.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé rud éigin a ṗlé leatI need to discuss something with you.

result.eng: Some other man.
result.ga: Fear éigin eile
result.orig: Fear éigin eile
result.html: Fear éigin eileSome other man.
result.ponchtml: Fear éigin eileSome other man.

result.eng: Some day next week.
result.ga: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainnSome day next week.
result.ponchtml: Lá éigin an tseaċtain seo ċugainnSome day next week.

result.eng: Wouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ga: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.orig: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.html: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ponchtml: Nárḃ ḟearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?

result.eng: We'll select a county, say Mayo, and do a documentary about it.
result.ga: Roghnóidh muid contae éigin abair Maigh Eo agus déanfaidh muid clár faisnéise faoi

result.eng: Somebody gave it to me.
result.ga: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.orig: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.eng: Somebody is here.
result.ga: Tá duine éigin anseo
result.orig: Tá duine éigin anseo
result.html: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.

result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.

result.eng: I'm worried that something is not right.
result.ga: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach

result.eng: Something's not right here.

result.orig: Tá rud éigin as alt anseo
result.html: Tá rud éigin as alt anseoSomething's not right here.

result.eng: There is something wrong with this car.

result.eng: It is somewhere in the city centre.

result.ponchtml: Tá sé áit éigin i lár na caṫraċIt is somewhere in the city centre.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois

result.eng: They wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ga: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.orig: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.html: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.

result.eng: Everybody has some artistic talent.

result.html: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.
result.ponchtml: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gaċ éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.

result.eng: They are scheming something!

result.orig: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu

result.eng: He's working for some huge corporation in America.

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.html: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
